title: Ticket #7202: Add support kubernetes in the grid universe
description: We want to support running jobs in a kubernetes cluster by stuffing them into dynamically created pods. The initial implementation needs to run GlideinWMS jobs at one site. We will add kubernetes as a new scheduler type under the blahp.
check_ins:

2019-Aug-09 11:08   Check-in [57646]: Initial support for kubernetes under the blahp. #7202 Add blahp scripts for running jobs in a kubernetes cluster.
